function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Globalization of cycles diminishing resilience","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagions and diseases on a global scale","Mitigation":"Reorganize cycles to optimize resilience at local level, implement strict health and safety measures","Technologies":"Supply chain management tools, health monitoring technologies","People":"Global population, workers in global supply chains, international travelers","Owner":"Governments, businesses, international organizations"},{"Description":"Short-term crisis management exacerbating future shocks","Impact":"Continued susceptibility to crises and shocks, including contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Adopt long-term risk-mitigation strategies, prioritize sustainable fiscal thinking over short-term solutions","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, adaptive planning technologies","People":"Economists, policy makers, disaster response teams","Owner":"Governments, financial institutions, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on resilience and sustainability","Impact":"Failure to achieve resilience and sustainability goals, heightened risk of economic, social, and environmental disruptions","Mitigation":"Shift focus from profit-driven economic model to resilience and sustainability, prioritize optimization of product cycles for longevity and reuse","Technologies":"Circular economy tools, sustainable product design technologies","People":"Policy makers, businesses, consumers","Owner":"Governments, corporations, consumer advocacy groups"}]}
